title: Dumbest INGSOC requirement
text:
Microsoft requiring anyone to have an app just to use their service is a snub to anyone who doesn't have a smartphone, and parts of the app allow Microsoft to have complete access to the phone's microphone, camera, GPS system at any time. 
Big Brother is watching.

title: Privacy issues
text: This app tracks your location even if you turn off the location permission on your phone to this app. Beware that you can be located when this app is on your phone.  And since it runs in the background with no way to disable that you will always be watched.

title: Huge Bug Issue
text:
I constantly open my email, it asks for me to open the authenticator app. Then displays the numbers but the box to enter it in NEVER pops up.

Extremely annoying since my work/life is in this app

title: Where is HR when you need them?
text: I’d give this app a 5 star rating if y’all stopped making the Microsoft 365 more and more complicated; and focused more on customer support… It is ridiculous in how we have to have a business license in order to simply receive support when we run into problems…

title: I hate Microsoft
text: Any company that collects your data is on my “hate-list”

title: Good
text: Good

title: Apple Watch Support
text: App is great for all uses except lacking in Apple Watch support, which pushes me to Duo instead.

title: Can’t even get a code
text: I use this app for homeschool- they gave me an email to use so that I could use for Microsoft and I had to download this app for school along with the others (excel, word, etc.) It used to work fine, but now whenever I need to sign into my school account, it tells me to enter the code that I get from authenticator and I never get a code so I can’t sign in anywhere that I’m not already signed in. Absolutely ridiculous

title: How did this build pass testing?
text: Want to have outlook talk to an app made by the same company so you can seamlessly access your secured email? Well this authenticator will request you sign in on its own app and not outlook so it can send a request to itself and then you never see the request because it’s screen is below your current screen. But if you leave your current screen, it will cancel the request.

title: Love this app
text: This app is real dope. I have never had anything wrong with it. I have a my system information on them and always keep it safe it’s a 10/10 app. I have had this app for 6 years now

title: BOOOO 👎👎👎
text: by far the most useless app in this app store.

title: Bad Version
text: Current version has too many glitches where this app and Microsoft’s website are not in sync which causes this app to effectively lock up and not allowed authentication until both programs are restarted.

title: Not going passed face recognition
text:
iPhone user here. not sure if anyone else is experiencing this: 
Upon opening the app, it does facial recognition and fails to proceed to the UI. It freezes on the Unlock screen.

title: won’t allow QR code signing in
text: continuously throw’s 2 digit sign in number from both browser & the authenticator app.. if you have problem signing in it tell’s you to enter a non-existant 6 digit code

title: Terrible to pair with outlook email
text: Since 2-way authentication has been in place this app has been useless on my phone. This requires the Authenticator app and when I open the ACTUAL Microsoft Authenticator app it says I need to open the app I’m already on. Emails never appear although I get the notification and the flagging system is confusing once you categorize an email. Most frustrating email app ever, if my work did not require an outlook account I would never touch this app.

title: Terrible don’t use
text: HOW GARBAGE MAKES NO SENSE

title: Dark UX Pattern
text: App forces you to add Microsoft Authenticator as a password manager on iOS.  Skip button does not work. Slimey user hostile move that should be investigated by the EU.

title: Can’t get into my work email now
text: Trapped in a loop looking for the code from the app. The code nor anything comes from the app. I try doing anything with the app, and it keeps saying I need to enter the code in the app even though I’m already in the stupid gd app. BEWARE DO NOT USE THIS APP IF YOU CAN AVOID IT. YOU WILL LOSE YOUR EMAIL. You try to call Microsoft, and there’s not a single person to speak to. It gives me a gd link for support and I can’t do anything with it because it wants me to sign in using the code from authenticator which I can’t get. EVERYTHING MICROSOFT TOUCHES TURNS TO CRAP. DONT USE THE APP.

title: Mandatory and doesn’t work
text: Mandatory in order to use some of the Microsoft apps, even though they can easily be authenticated by phone number. it is a hassle to set up and the QR scanner doesn’t work. Microsoft always tries to make you use their apps and products until they realize it doesn’t work at all and then changes everything. It’s their constant way of losing money and clients.

title: Keeps making me log in
text: So annoying

title: Sharing information to employer
text: User content, Useage Data, and Contact Info should not be shared with my employer who requires I use this application on my personal devices. This is disgusting.

title: The stupidest app ever made
text: I appreciate the 2 step authentication when logging in my my Microsoft account however the 2 step verification doesn’t even work when the the number to verify pops up

title: El mejor de todos
text: El mejor de todos

title: LOVE IT!
text: I love it SO much! Thanks, Microsoft !

title: Stuck in a loop and out of my emails/school account
text: I can't login to my email because I need to use the authenticator app. So, I go to the Authenticator App and try to login, but in order to get into the authenticator app, I need to be logged into the authenticator app. I select an option that states that I can't use the authenticator app and it takes me to a screen that requires me to verify a code in the authenticator app. Meanwhile, I'm logged out of my school account and school email and can't get in. I don't have words at this point to describe how stupid it is that such a reputable company has such a blatant blindspot in their process.

title: Unnecessary and annoying mandatory
text: I’ve been working with computers for over 30 years. I’ve never been phished or hacked. This stuff is annoying!

title: Beware - you will lose access to your accounts
text: This app is a fantastic way to lose access to your accounts. After switching phones and using the built in restore feature, I found myself locked out of my University exchange account. I made the unfortunate error of relying solely on this app for authentication and now my account is unrecoverable. It’s wild that the restore feature doesn’t restore access to accounts, as it asks me to sign in and scan a new QR code. It’s funny because in order to do that, I need the OTP or sign in notification that the app can’t give me. This app is fine for quick sign-ins for Microsoft accounts, but DO NOT rely on this for actual account security. Having a backup like Raivo or Authy is a must.

title: Counterintuitive
text:
Actually unusable. I have it for my work email and if you open Microsoft mail, it takes you straight to the app. 

In the Authenticator app, it says to open the Authenticator app and input numbers… but you can’t because the numbers it’s showing you is in the app, and does not allow you to put in numbers….

I’m stumped on how I’m supposed to use it

title: Recovery absolutely failing!
text:

Absurd.

title: Worst app I’ve ever used

title: App is totally draining my iPhone battery
text: 38% of my battery today went to this crap app! I am updating it, because I have to use it for work. I know the background app refresh setting does not work because I do not allow that, and I close this draining app after every use, yet somehow it is still draining my battery!

title: Worst app ever

title: Impossible to Migrate from Android
text: There’s no support for migrating accounts from Android to iOS. The only “solution” they give is to set up all of your 2FA accounts again.

title: Hack My A***
text:
Hackers can’t use your phone info to get the codes. 
W/Iphone, you have to enter your passcode / Face before accessing Authenticator app - to get the new refresh codes. Triple extra security layer!

title: Won’t even log in my MS Team app
text: I had no issues using MS Teams on my mobile but since my company wanted us to download this thing, the log in error started. I had missed a class today cause of this! I was not on a computer so my phone is the next available option. But it won’t even register my phone and it keeps saying “login error”

title: It would be better if has a Watch App
text: Would be nice to have a watch App, sometimes you had to go to another room to reach for your phone, when you got your Watch on your wrist.

title: Stupid they removed the apply watch app
text: Stupid they removed the apply watch app

title: Horrible
text: App doesn’t work anymore. Code doesn’t come up, can’t put in code into authenticator. Can’t access any of my email accounts now. Do better multi-billion dollar company.

title: YOU FORCED ME TO DOWN LOAD THIS APP AND COLLECT INFORMATION FROM ME
text: All I wanted to do was look at my email but NOOOOooooo. You have forced me to download an app just so you can collect my personal information for an email that I don’t even care about. And my phone of now full of useless apps that I don’t need so I barely have room for the apps I want. I hope your business burns to the ground and all your employees become homeless.

title: My app and PC screen are the same
text: My app doesn’t give me a code to verify my log in. Isn’t that the point of having a password protected account. This is absolutely ridiculous and now I can’t do an essential part of my job because I can’t log it. I click the link that says I don’t have access to the app but it says I need a 6 digit code which is never given in the app. The dumbest thing I’ve come across and there’s no way to reach out to an actual person for support. Thank you for making my job that much more difficult.

title: Awesome app. The most annoying bug
text: Please stop forcing me to sign in twice, once for verifying an app login and then a second time to get into the app to view codes. It makes no sense, I am using the same credentials.. If you’d just preserve my login token for just one more step! I’ll update my review when the app gets an update to resolve this annoying bug.

title: I’m permanently locked from changing my password
text: if I try to change it on PC, it says it sent a verification code to the authenticator app. but if I try to use the authenticator app: I can’t access the verification code because I can’t even sign in. funnily enough, if I hit “I forgot my password” in the app: the app says it sent the code to the app! this is a horrible  and punishing system that locks users out of their own accounts due to overly strict security measurements.

title: Exelente
text: Una muy buena app

title: Finding a replacement for Authenticator+ before I switch phones
text: I guess auth+ is gone now? Duo Mobile has backup but tying the backup to a msft account seems like a good long game play. So far it’s been good.
